page.title: 16LEGEND OF THE DUNCOW
page.content: NEAR TO{STRETTON ON DUNSMORE}ALONG THE A45 IS A MOUND WHICH ORIGINALLY HAD TREES ON. IT WAS AT THIS MOUND THAT THE LEGEND OF{THE DUNCOW}IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE OCCURRED. A FAMILY FOUND{A HORNED COW, BROWN, FOUR METRES {HIGH AND SIX METRES LONG.}IT WAS MILKED REGULARLY. MANY PEOPLE CAME TO MILK IT AND IT GAVE MILK REGULARLY BECAUSE IT COULD NOT SEE THE MILK (WHICH RAN INTO A SIEVE). ONE DAY THE COW BECAME ANGRY, KICKING AND KILLING PEOPLE. THE KING WANTED TO RID THE LAND OF THE COW AND CALLED{GUY OF {WARWICK.}THERE WAS A BATTLE IN WHICH GUY KILLED THE COW WITH HIS BATTLE AXE. THERE WERE GREAT CELEBRATIONS AND GUY WAS KNIGHTED, BECOMING{SIR GUY OF {WARWICK.
